text: modern ai applications have become so
complex and infrastructure intensive
that developers have no option but to
distribute execution across multiple
machines
but building and running distributed
apps is hard
that's why we built ray an open source
distributed execution framework that
makes it effortless to instantly scale
ai and machine learning workloads
with simple and flexible apis developers
can easily parallelize any python code
with minimal code changes
a rich ecosystem of distributed machine
learning libraries and integrations
further lowers the effort needed to
scale compute intensive workloads such
as deep learning and hyper parameter
tuning
developers can easily develop their apps
on their laptop and then instantly scale
the same code elastically across
hundreds of nodes or gpus on any cloud
with no code changes
ray automatically handles all aspects of
distributed execution including
orchestration scheduling fault tolerance
and auto scaling so that you can scale
your apps without becoming a distributed
systems expert
in under four years ray has seen
tremendous growth in adoption
thousands of companies are using ray to
build and scale their mission critical
ai apps from recommendation systems and
supply chain optimization to robot
assisted surgery and large-scale
ecosystem restoration
building on the success of ray we are
thrilled to introduce the any scale
platform a fully managed service to
build run and manage ray apps
just point your ray apps to any scale
and let any scale handle all the
infrastructure and cluster provisioning
and management for you with zero devops
overhead
as the creators of ray we are bringing
you the best cloud for running ray apps
complete with production ready features
like production jobs and services
observability dashboards and computing
cost visibility
instantly scale the full ai life cycle
from data loading and training to
deploying the final model as a reliable
production service all on a single
platform
developers are choosing any scale for
everything from scaling reinforcement
learning for in-game offer
recommendations to large-scale image
analysis for ecosystem restoration to
automating attribute detection and
classification in e-commerce
we welcome you to experience the magic
of instant scaling on any scale and
bring your ai initiatives to market
faster than ever before with ray
